roleset.name: taking a vote (not the piece of paper! that is not eventive!)

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Julia Gillard has beaten her predecessor Kevin Rudd in a ballot for the federal Labor leadership by a margin of 73 votes to 29 .

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE!! Call this .YY
example.text: On Indian gaming , I 'll mention that the Navajo Nation put casino gambling on the ballot twice .

example.name: Light Verb: take
example.text: Well , after we had retired , why , we read over the questions and one thing and another , and spoke to one another about it , and It seemed like one was one way and one another , so we just took a ballot on It , and it was seven to five In favor of Mitchell .

roleset.note: BALLOT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN eventive nouns, vote-n.01. No VNcls. (from ballot.01-n)
Most instances of 'ballot' in nouns are not going to be eventive. Please refer to the examples, watch out for light verbs, and be very careful! (from ballot.01-n)
